value:
$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|You understand, don't you?
Prince Alfonse is dead.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス0,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|"No, it cannot be true!" echoes in your
mind, but your wishes cannot change
the reality of it.$k$p"Prince Alfonse cannot die! He must
be alive and well!"$k$pAnd through your pain and your
sadness, you created this world
of dreams.$k$pYou even took on the role of your
beloved late prince yourself...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|It's all lies! You're making it up!
Prince Alfonse has to be alive...
Stop trying to trick us, Freyja!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Is it a lie? I need answers, now.$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I-I don't know! There's no way
to tell if she's lying...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|I know a way. Simply observe
as this dream continues for
all eternity.$k$pYou must keep on dreaming,
$Nu. Forever.$k$p

$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Submit to me. Only then will you
find happiness.$k$pTrust me, $Nu...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Why...resist? Are you upset that
I ruined your dream and told you
the truth, $Nu?$k$p$EFace|If that is the case, please accept
my apologies...for everything.$k$pYou—and only you—are very special.
You should be treated with respect.
I acknowledge that.$k$p$EFace_Smile|So, I will offer you the choice...
If you must know the truth, you
must choose. Dream or reality?$k$pWhich will it be? Remain in a dream
with your friend alive forever, or toss
him aside to return to your reality...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス0,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Surely my brother noticed you also...
You are a mystery to us. Beyond us.
You escape divine understanding.$k$pThat makes your dream special.
With your power, this dream truly
could continue forever...$k$pHere, we can both have what
we want. We can resurrect my
brother and Prince Alfonse...$k$pWorlds are yours to create
and mold to your wishes...$k$pChoose the dream, and you will
enjoy never-ending happiness.
I will give you all you desire.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス0,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Anger|If you should choose reality,
however...you will wake to a
world without Prince Alfonse.$k$pShould you choose reality, I will bring
the lives of the álfar to an end.$k$pNo defeat will stop me. I gave them
their lives, and it would be a simple
task to take them away.$k$pShould you choose reality, then by
all means, try to defeat me. You will
have to in order to awaken.$k$pIn the end, regardless of your choice,
I will not allow you to wake. There is
nothing you can do. Submit.$k$p$Sbs150|
